title: POOE-Lite: A lightweight, Kaggle-friendly version of POOE for effector prediction in oomycetes
description: POOE-Lite provides a streamlined implementation of the POOE tool for effector prediction, adapted for ease of use in Kaggle notebooks and integration into Nextflow pipelines. It facilitates motif analysis using MEME, JASPAR, and ELM databases. This version retains the core functionality of POOE while enhancing accessibility for computational workflows.

creators.name: Bharti, Sakshi
